name: automattic/facebook-instant-articles-wp
description: Add support for Instant Articles for Facebook to your WordPress site.

prepare-ci: bash bin/install-wp-tests.sh wordpress_test root root localhost

scripts-descriptions.cs: Run PHPCS to checking coding standards for the Facebook Instant Articles plugin.
scripts-descriptions.lint: Run PHP linting on the Facebook Instant Articles plugin.
scripts-descriptions.lint-ci: Run PHP linting on the Facebook Instant Articles plugin with checkstyle output for CI.
scripts-descriptions.prepare-ci: Install the files and setup a database needed to run tests for the Facebook Instant Articles plugin for CI.
scripts-descriptions.test: Run the unit tests for the Facebook Instant Articles plugin.
scripts-descriptions.test-ms: Run the unit tests for the Facebook Instant Articles plugin on a multisite install.
